approach: Fixed min-max bounds informed by 5th-95th percentiles from raw-feature-analysis.json
note: Bounds are FROZEN - work for one-by-one ingestion, no population stats needed

font_size_min.note: From empirical p95=16.8, extended to 20px. Min raised to 6px (validation filter).

font_size_max.note: From empirical p05=19.2, p95=94, extended to 150px to capture large hero text.

font_weight_min.note: Highly skewed (-1.79). Empirical range [300, 400], extended down to 100.

spacing_min.note: Now filtered to > 0 in extraction, but keep 0 as lower bound for safety.

spacing_median.note: Highly skewed (-1.58). Empirical p05=16, p95=24, extended for variety.

spacing_max.note: Symmetric (skew=0.01). Empirical p05=32, p95=48, extended to 96px.

radius_min.note: Highly skewed (3.28) due to outliers. Post-validation, cap at 8px.

radius_max.note: Highly skewed (2.71). After capping at 100px in extraction, use 0-100 range.

shadow_count.note: Count feature. Empirical range [0, 3]. Log scale for counts.

color_role_distinction.note: Layout feature. Hardcoded range from original implementation.

image_text_balance.note: Ratio feature, log scale. Centered at 1.0 (balanced).

gestalt_grouping.note: Layout feature. Hardcoded range from original implementation.

color_palette_avg_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance. Theoretical max ~100 for opposing colors.

color_bg_text_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance between background and text.

color_cta_bg_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance between CTA and background.

color_cta_text_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance between CTA and text colors.

color_hero_bg_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance between hero and background.

color_bg_chroma.note: LCH chroma. Theoretical max ~150 for sRGB gamut.

color_hero_chroma.note: LCH chroma. Theoretical max ~150 for sRGB gamut.

color_hero_hue_cos.note: Cosine of hue angle. Circular encoding.

color_hero_hue_sin.note: Sine of hue angle. Circular encoding.

color_cta_chroma.note: LCH chroma. Theoretical max ~150 for sRGB gamut.

color_cta_hero_distance.note: CIEDE2000 distance between CTA and hero colors.

cta_bg_lightness.note: LCH lightness for CTA background. Theoretical bounds [0, 100].

cta_bg_chroma.note: LCH chroma for CTA background. Theoretical max ~150 for sRGB gamut.

cta_bg_hue_cos.note: Cosine of CTA background hue angle. Circular encoding.

cta_bg_hue_sin.note: Sine of CTA background hue angle. Circular encoding.

cta_text_lightness.note: LCH lightness for CTA text. Theoretical bounds [0, 100].

cta_text_chroma.note: LCH chroma for CTA text. Theoretical max ~150 for sRGB gamut.

cta_text_hue_cos.note: Cosine of CTA text hue angle. Circular encoding.

cta_text_hue_sin.note: Sine of CTA text hue angle. Circular encoding.

cta_font_size.note: CTA button font size. Typical range for button text.

cta_font_weight.note: CTA button font weight. Standard CSS weights.

cta_border_radius.note: CTA button border radius. Typical range for buttons.

cta_padding_x.note: CTA horizontal padding. Typical range for buttons.

cta_padding_y.note: CTA vertical padding. Typical range for buttons.

cta_hover_opacity.note: CTA hover opacity. Common range for opacity changes.

cta_min_tap_side.note: Minimum tap target size. Accessibility guideline 44-48px.

brand_color_coverage.note: Percentage of page area using brand colors. Can exceed 100% due to text + background overlap.

accent_color_coverage.note: Percentage of page area using accent colors. Can exceed 100% due to text + background overlap.

foundation_color_coverage.note: Percentage of page area using foundation colors. Can exceed 100% due to text + background overlap.
